means.word_mean: 1. a painter or drawer of portraits

auth_sentence.content: While waiting, the limner examined his work.
auth_sentence.res_content: While waiting, the limner examined his work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: While waiting, the limner examined his work.

auth_sentence.content: It was as if he imagined that the limner, being shorn of words, thereby lacked amusement.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was as if he imagined that the limner, being shorn of words, thereby lacked amusement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was as if he imagined that the limner, being shorn of words, thereby lacked amusement.

auth_sentence.content: It would do the man no service in God's eyes if the limner allowed him to appear puffed up with all the dignity he demanded.
